identificationModule.briefTitle: Dose-Response-Study With a Recombinant Cocktail of Phleum (rPhleum) Allergens
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Double-blind Placebo-controlled Dose-response Study for Evaluation of Safety and Efficacy of Immunotherapy With a Cocktail of Recombinant Major Allergens of Timothy Grass Pollen (Phleum Pratense) Adsorbed to Aluminium Hydroxide in Patients With IgE-mediated Allergic Rhinitis/Rhinoconjunctivitis With or Without Bronchial Asthma

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Dose-response trial with a cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Timothy Grass Pollen (Phleum pratense)

armGroups.label: Placebo
armGroups.description: Placebo: Al(OH)3-Placebos with histamine-dihydrochloride analogue Allergen-Adsorbate rPhleum strengthes 1 to 4.

armGroups.label: 20 μg rPhleum Immunotherapy
armGroups.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 1 (20 μg)

armGroups.label: 40 μg rPhleum Immunotherapy
armGroups.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 2 (40 μg)

armGroups.label: 80 μg rPhleum Immunotherapy
armGroups.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 3 (80 μg)

armGroups.label: 120 μg rPhleum Immunotherapy
armGroups.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 4 (120 μg)

interventions.name: placebo
interventions.description: Placebo: Al(OH)3-Placebos with histamine-dihydrochloride analogue Allergen-Adsorbate rPhleum strengthes 1 to 4.

interventions.name: rPhleum
interventions.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 1 (20 μg)

interventions.name: rPhleum
interventions.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 2 (40 μg)

interventions.name: rPhleum
interventions.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 3 (80 μg)

interventions.name: rPhleum
interventions.description: Cocktail of recombinant major allergens of Phleum pratense (timothy grass) with strength 4 (120 μg)

primaryOutcomes.description: Number of patients with at least one systemic reaction (according to Tryba Grade 1-4) with possible, probable or definite relationship to the study medication determined at the end of the uptitration phase.

secondaryOutcomes.description: Changes of the Late Phase Reactions in specific intracutaneous test with natural allergen before and at the end of the double-blind placebo controlled phase before grass pollen season.
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: before and at the end of the double-blind phase

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* main symptoms of allergic rhinitis/rhinoconjunctivitis with or without controlled asthma against grass pollen allergens
* positive SPT
* positive EAST
* positive specific provocation test

Exclusion Criteria:

* serious chronic diseases
* other perennial allergies
